attributes.review:
This app is just awful and promotes an awful man and an awful way of looking at the world. It promotes hate in our society where there should be love and understanding. When I opened the app I almost had a heart attack because of the ugly deformed picture on the front of a wrinkly old orange. Also it doesnâ€™t look safe because itâ€™s asking for my phone number right off the bat. Instead of being worried about tiktok we should worry about this app stealing our data and apparently our personalities and ability to get our heads out of our presidents butt to see the world for what it actually is. 

Here is a personal message to the president AKA bunker boy:

attributes.review: Like the title states this app actually had sexual intercourse with my father. Once my mother discovered his infidelity, she filed for divorce. Heartbroken over the destruction of his family unit my dad told the Trump app he couldnâ€™t continue their sexual affair. To get revenge on us, the Trump app then snuck into my home and shot our family dog. This app is the most horrible, smelly, dangerous, revolting, unethical, and murders dogs. It is also a furry which is really uncomfortable. If I could give it zero stars i would. I hope you find this review helpful!

attributes.review: This app is literally the worse thing ever created. Downloading this app actually took years off of my life. So disappointed. -10000/10 would not recommend. Pretty embarrassing to be honest.
